Reviews.Title: “Nice surprise!”
Reviews.Author: Chrystel S
Reviews.Content: family march 2012 service clean bathroom breakfast hotel located blocks station allows move anytime own home thanks expecially boys girls front desk

Reviews.Title: “Over the years, our best choice in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Martin O
Reviews.Content: finding decent hotel rome difficult hotel excellent location near train station metro station castro pretorio mainstream attractions eternal city easy reach touristic beloved san lorenzo universitys neighborhood pizzeria del street probably togo pizzerias town hotel ritz spend time rome ok staff friendly breakfast superb overall comfy stay

Reviews.Title: “We stayed here for 6 Nights”
Reviews.Author: Davo_NZ
Reviews.Content: stayed 6 nights close termini sation 300m budget hotel people staying clean tidy staff helpful breakfast included excellent start day relatively close major sites colosseum 20 minute walk sites walking distance vatican 30 minute walk walking definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “avoid”
Reviews.Author: mpep
Reviews.Content: placed toilet leaked hot water shower blocked shower tray unpleasant smell corridor shabby smelly staff helpful tourist info denied plumbing insisted bothered disappointing
